rooms.description: Central living space with minimalist decor and functional seating.
Efficient kitchen layout with essential appliances and ample counter space.
Master bedroom with built-in storage and minimalistic design for a family of four.
Cozy library/study area integrated within the living space to promote a quiet atmosphere and reading space.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to allow positive energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.
Window providing ample natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu principles.
Interior door connecting living area to kitchen, ensuring connectivity on the ground floor.
